name: Target:Summit(目标：登顶 )
description:
This is a lightweight mountaineering-themed strategy game. You need to allocate your physical strength and time reasonably, plan your route, and successfully climb the mountain before you run out of food.

Have fun in the game! If you like the following elements, you can try to buy this game:
  • Card-based lightweight strategy game
  • Pixel art
  • The estimated duration of the story mode is about 30 minutes, and the duration of the endless mode is up to you!
  • climbing theme
  • isomeric art style
